mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_deliverables_result ( deliverables_section_id, lms_user_id, score, feedback, file_path, file_size, submission_time, account_id, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{deliverablesSectionId}, #{lmsUserId}, #{score}, #{feedback}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{submissionTime}, #{accountId}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
